Header: Cricket Tournament Held to Promote Goodwill in Killinochchi
Content: Following an initiative taken by the 57 Division Headquarters in close liaison with the Security Force Headquarters - Killinochchi (SFHQ-KLN), a friendly cricket tournament, designed to promote goodwill and reconciliation, took place at the 57 Division Headquarters grounds in Killinochchi on Sunday (1). The match was played between Thirunagar Super King (TSK) and 57 Division Headquarters cricket teams. TSK team defeated the 57 Division team and secured the Championship.
